Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-27144 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.2-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-27144 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.2-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package skopeo is earlier than 1.14.2-10, affected by CVE-2025-27144
